name: Radisson Collection, Strand Hotel, Stockholm
description: Modern and cosy, Radisson Collection Strand Hotel Stockholm is situated in Stockholm and provides free Wi-Fi. It is ideally positioned for those wanting to sightsee in the area. This 5-star hotel offers a coffee bar, a 24-hour reception and valet parking. Corporate amenities include a business centre. Radisson Collection Strand Hotel Stockholm has 170 rooms that are fitted with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Honeymoon suites are also available. Guests staying at Radisson Collection Strand Hotel Stockholm can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently located for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. A wide selection of dining options are also found nearby. Stockholm's attractions, such as the Royal Swedish Opera and Kungstradgarden, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. The surrounding neighbourhood is also famous for its shopping.Revato

name: Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection
description: Welcome to the Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection, located on the fashionable Standvagen, an extraordinary 4 Star hotel that many call their second home. Within a comfortable walking distance from cultural attractions, shopping, first-class restaurants, the archipelago and round-trip boats, this beautiful boutique hotel stand with pride.bestwestern.com

name: Hilton Stockholm Slussen
description: Welcome to the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel, enjoying wonderful views over the water and the Old Town. The hotel is located in the hip Södermalm area and conveniently located within walking distance to many of Stockholm's main tourist attractions and the city center. All 289 guest and 16 meeting rooms are filled with natural daylight and featuring stylish Swedish décor. Choose from a range of spacious Hilton Guest, Deluxe, Executive rooms and Suites at the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel. When upgrading to an Executive room or Suite you will enjoy the breath-taking city and sea views and exclusive access to the hotel’s contemporary Executive lounge. When you want to keep up your fitness regime we offer a selection of cardiovascular equipment and free weights, or you can take part in an energetic exercise class. You can also make an appointment with a personal trainer. In Panorama Restaurant you can enjoy a sumptuous breakfast to get the day off to a great start. Eken Bar offers Scandinavian cuisine with an international twist, serving both lunch and dinner. We use seasonal ingredients, which are locally produced, wherever we can. In Eken Bar, you can sip on a well-made cocktail, while enjoying the lounge music and panoramic views over the city.Hilton

name: Lydmar Hotel
description: Situated by the National Museum, this chic waterfront hotel offers views of the Old Town and Royal Palace. It offers a popular bistro-style restaurant and art exhibitions. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Lydmar Hotel’s spacious rooms are individually decorated and have wooden floors. Many feature original stucco work, wood beams and high windows. All have a TV, minibar. The hotel restaurant serves European cuisine; everything from escargots to steak tartare to Sicilian fish. In the summer, the outdoor terrace offers a relaxing setting where guests can enjoy fresh cocktails. Archipelago boat tours regularly depart from Strömkajen Harbour, which is 100 metres from Lydmar Hotel. Stureplan Square, with its shops and nightlife, is a 10-minute walk away. Staff will happily recommend other local sights and attractions.

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
description: Grand Hôtel Stockholm is situated on the waterfront opposite the Royal Palace and the Old Town, 1 km from Central Station. It offers fine dining, a spa and free WiFi access. Grand’s air-conditioned rooms have an LCD TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Rooms also offer courtyard, city or waterfront views. Grand Hôtel Nordic Spa & Fitness has exercise equipment and an in-door pool. Spa treatments include facials, foot massages and naprapathy. Grand Stockholm also offers chauffeur-driven limousine transfers and 24-hour room service.
